Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute at Northwest Hwy/Neola
ShortDescription: 68 Northwest Highway buses temp. rrted: Northwest Hwy, Nagle, Milwaukee, Devon, & Northwest Highway due to, street blockage near Northwest Hwy/Neola.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Northwest Highway, Nagle, Milwaukee, Devon, and Northwest Highway due to, street blockage near Northwest Hwy/Neola.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/51st
